statements: DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE id = 1001 AND product_name = 'Chair';
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date < '2022-01-01' AND total_amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM SalesData WHERE sales_id = 100 AND sale_amount > 500.00
DELETE FROM SalesData WHERE SalesID = 100 AND SalesAmount > 500.00
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE ProductID = (SELECT MAX(ProductID) FROM Inventory)
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < 10 AND last_checked_date < '2022-01-01';
